captionOnboarding.step1Content: Here you can see your video with transcription. Click on any caption to start editing. You can drag the caption to change its position and resize it using the red border handles.
captionOnboarding.step2Content: When you click on a caption, the styling editor appears here. You can customize the font color, font family, font weight, and background color of your subtitles.
captionOnboarding.step3Content: Switch between Zoom and Landscape formats. Zoom crops the video to fit vertical screens (9:16), while Landscape maintains a wider aspect ratio (16:9) for horizontal viewing.
captionOnboarding.step4Content: Use the slider below the video to change the start and end points of your reel. Drag the markers to select the exact portion you want to export.
captionOnboarding.step5Content: Edit your video transcription here. Click on any text segment to modify it. Changes will automatically sync with the captions on the video.
captionOnboarding.step6Content: Click here to export your final video with all captions and edits. Choose your preferred platform and quality settings before exporting.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Welcome to Reelify. We value your trust and are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
privacy.videoInfoText: When you upload a video, we process it locally on your device. Video content is not permanently stored on our servers and is automatically deleted after the processing session ends.
privacy.preferencesInfoText: We collect your preferences related to target platform, clip duration, target audience, tone, and opening style. This information is only used to improve the quality of produced clips.
privacy.usageInfoText: We use anonymous analytics services (such as Vercel Analytics) to understand how the service is used and improve it. This data does not contain personally identifiable information.
dataUsageList: Understanding usage patterns to develop the service
Communicating with you about important updates (if you subscribe to the mailing list)
privacy.dataSecurityText: We take reasonable security measures to protect your information, including:
dataSecurityList: Processing video locally on your device whenever possible
Encrypting data in transit using HTTPS
Automatically deleting temporary files after the session ends
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us via email.
